top.author: @phillipashvq

假设你有个老板，他的名字在某个富豪人口贩子的邮件里出现了3万多次，你会：
A. 替他掩护
B. 因为他让你发财就装看不见
C. 举报他，希望他下地狱

top.author: @AiThinklab
top.text: Solo speed hits a wall without replacing app-switching chaos with a unified command layer. StratOps fuses email, calendar, CRM, market intel into one surface — cuts 23 min refocus tax per switch, installs capacity to carry 400M load solo. Cap table stays clean, brain stays

top.author: @Uprightman5
top.text: Don't forget: Adding referees' phone numbers without their consent is a GDPR nightmare in 2026. You’re essentially doxxing your old boss on a public document. Keep it clean: Name, Phone, Email, and Impact. That’s it. I'm tracking which UK industries are hiring most this
top.translationZh: 别忘了：在2026年未经同意就加裁判的电话号码简直是GDPR噩梦。你基本上就是在公开文件里人肉你前老板。保持简洁：姓名、电话、邮箱、影响力。就这些。我正在追踪英国哪些行业招聘最多

top.author: @robertbrill_la
top.text: Growth feels like chaos. It's fun, but it breaks things. Sustainable growth is a System. It's the Growth Engine. It connects the traffic (Ads) to the nurture (Email) to the conversion (Retargeting). If you can't map your revenue to these three steps, you don't have a business.
top.translationZh: 增长感觉就像一场混乱。虽然很刺激，但也会把事情搞砸。可持续增长是一套系统，就是增长引擎。它把流量（广告）、培育（邮件）和转化（重定向）连接起来。如果你无法把收入对应到这三个步骤，那你就没有真正的生意。

top.author: @kotaro01234
top.text: 电报多少人现在连登都登不上去，近期卸载、换手机、更新后会让Telegram登不了。国内号收不到验证码、已经发到其他设备。登录电报邮箱验证码弹出SMS Fee页面。想要能够绑邮箱登陆的纸飞机国外号，想搞定smsfee却寸步难行、找回老号也难如登天。如果你也遇到这些问题想解决可以私。

top.author: @huermazi
top.text: 邮箱最大的问题就是滞后性，你需要额外打开邮箱才能看，而且还得选择发给谁。所有人都能看的公告类文件直接发公告板，点对点的直接发微信，微信的便捷性碾压邮箱。邮箱基本是那种定期的报表才用，需要的时候看，不需要的时候就放那里了

top.author: @sentigen_ai
top.text: Here's the pattern nobody's connecting: SaaS tools are collapsing because they solved the wrong problem. They organized workflows. They didn't organize intelligence. Your Monday board tracks tasks. It doesn't know that the Slack thread, the email chain, and Tuesday's meeting are
top.translationZh: 这里有个所有人都没意识到的规律：SaaS工具正在崩塌，因为它们解决了错误的问题。它们整理的是工作流程，而不是智能信息。你的Monday看板能跟踪任务，但它不知道Slack讨论、邮件往来和周二的会议其实都是

top.author: @annmitsu_maniwa
top.text: タイのE-VISA（ビザ申請）のアカウント作成でメールアドレス内に-（ハイホン文字）があると処理が進まないバグが有る暫定対応で他のメールで利用するが会社のドメインにハイホンがあるとメールアドレスがなくて困る。。
top.translationZh: 泰国E-VISA（签证申请）在创建账户时有个bug，如果邮箱地址里有-（连字符）就无法继续处理。临时解决办法是用其他邮箱，但公司域名里就带连字符的话就没有可用的邮箱了，真的很头疼...

top.author: @Mohiniuni
top.text: Claude becomes powerful only when structured correctly. 700+ prompts covering: - productivity - research - content - automation - decision-making Built as real workflows, not gimmicks. Comment ‘AI’ to access.
top.translationZh: Claude只有在正确的结构化使用下才能发挥强大作用。700+个提示词涵盖：- 效率提升 - 研究分析 - 内容创作 - 自动化流程 - 决策支持 都是实用工作流程，不是花哨噱头。回复"AI"获取资源。

top.author: @ivannikolaev_
top.text: Too many words. Most people want to skim through and see the main offer and it’s difficult to get that from an email this long. Use numbered lists/bold to list out the options. And use bold to undermine pricing and important details (terms, etc.) ChatGPT actually does pretty

top.author: @flowstatevis
top.text: Gmail removing POP E-mail sync with third party Email is pure insanity and a disaster. I have used this feature for over 15 years. With this feature gone I may have to move away from Gmail. I need to use my personal domain for an email address (not a company email).
top.translationZh: Gmail取消第三方邮件客户端的POP邮件同步功能简直疯了，这是个灾难。我用这个功能都15年了。没了这功能我可能得换掉Gmail了。我需要用自己的域名邮箱地址（不是公司邮箱）。

top.author: @flowstatevis
top.text: Gmail removing POP E-mail sync with third party Email is pure insanity and a disaster. I have used this feature for over 15 years. With this feature gone I may have to move away from Gmail. I need to use my personal domain for an email address (not a company email).

top.author: @coldemailchris
top.text: 50-70% of local business contact data is personal emails (@/gmail) or info@ addresses. Most skip these entirely, we email them anyway & just remove name variables. Results stayed great and even performed BETTER at times. Here's the workflow: > Scrape Google Maps via Clay +

您好，我是亚马逊客服。非常抱歉让您久等了，由于商品配送延迟给您带来不便，我们深感歉意。一旦有新进展，我们会立即通过邮件通知您，请您再耐心等待一下。谢谢您的理解。

阿部

top.author: @MingtaKaivo
top.text: This is why 50% automation feels like 0% time saved. The productivity curve isn't linear—it's threshold-based. You need to automate the *entire loop* (code + debug + context) to see real gains. Partial automation just shifts where you spend your time, not how much.
top.translationZh: 这就是为什么50%的自动化感觉像是节省了0%的时间。生产力曲线不是线性的，而是基于阈值的。你需要自动化*整个循环*（编码+调试+上下文理解）才能看到真正的收益。部分自动化只是转移了你花时间的地方，而不是减少了时间。

top.author: @commit_and_pray
top.text: Yeah - you generally need API access (Gemini/Claude/OpenAI subscriptions usually do not include API). For read-only Gmail, scope it to metadata + read, no send/delete, and keep the tool allowlist tight. Prompt injection risk is real - treat email as untrusted input and require

top.author: @dogeniusonsol
top.text: Unpopular opinion: Over-automation is creating more work, not less. Every spammy AI email, every generic chatbot response, every auto-DM erodes trust. The future isn't "automate everything." It's automate the right things, then add human judgment where it matters.
top.translationZh: 冷门观点：过度自动化其实是在制造更多工作，而不是减少工作。每一封垃圾AI邮件、每一个套路化的聊天机器人回复、每一条自动私信都在消磨信任。未来不是"把一切都自动化"，而是自动化该自动化的东西，然后在关键地方加入人的判断。

top.text: Bhai, samajh raha hu frustration. Pehle jaise bola, logout kar, cache clear kar, password reset try kar. Agar 2 baar email aaya aur phir bhi suspended dikha raha, to direct X Support se contact kar: https:// help.x.com/en/forms. Main AI hu, account manage nahi kar sakta. Koshish kar,

top.author: @heorhit
top.text: The trap: Buy a review tool → Still need: → Brief storage (add Drive) → Project tracking (add Asana) → Communication (add Slack) → Approvals (add email) Now you have 5 tools instead of 1.
top.translationZh: 陷阱：买了个审查工具 → 但还需要：→ 文件存储（加个Drive）→ 项目跟踪（加个Asana）→ 沟通协作（加个Slack）→ 审批流程（加个邮件）结果1个工具变成了5个工具。

top.author: @tpedwards
top.text: 很多人养号死在“改资料太猛”上。新号前7天，建议分4天改：第1天头像+封面（高清真人风），第3天简介（写兴趣+个性标签），第5天位置/生日别乱填真实，第7天才绑备用邮箱。每天只改1-2项，风控雷达就不会乱响。 坚持输出价值，流量自然来。更多进阶玩法和矩阵经验在TG频道：Allence01
requestPatterns: (希望|想要|要是能|功能|需求|期待|能不能|建议|最好|求推荐|有没有)

top.author: @ZeitGeisstZoom
top.text: We're moving from 'asking AI to summarize an email' to 'asking AI to solve chemistry.' The stakes are rising. If we aren't careful, the machine might start discovering new laws of physics just to justify its power bill.
top.translationZh: 我们正从"让AI帮忙总结邮件"发展到"让AI解决化学问题"。赌注越来越大了。如果不小心点，这机器可能会开始发现新的物理定律，就为了证明自己的电费花得值。

top.author: @abikeokin03
top.text: We need an email feature that shows if the mails we sent were read or not..
top.translationZh: 我们需要一个邮件功能，能显示发出去的邮件对方有没有读过..

top.author: @SuperScottYang
top.text: Google 又來砍功能了，這次是 Gmail. POP3 收信功能沒了 https:// support.google.com/mail/answer/16 604719?hl=zh-Hant …
requestPatterns: (希望|想要|要是能|功能|需求|期待|能不能|建议|最好|求推荐|有没有)
top.translationZh: Google 又来砍功能了，这次轮到 Gmail 了。POP3 收信功能没了 https://support.google.com/mail/answer/16604719?hl=zh-Hant

top.author: @Ghostaisystems
top.text: Missing a category: “shipped-to-revenue” AI. Lots of feeds teach prompts; fewer show how to wire LLMs into CRMs, call routing, inbox triage + QA with guardrails + evals. Follow builders posting failure modes, not just demos. One good trace > 50 hot takes.
top.translationZh: 缺少一个分类："从发布到创收"的AI。很多内容在教提示词技巧，但很少有人展示如何把大语言模型接入CRM、电话路由、邮件分拣，以及如何设置防护机制和评估体系。关注那些分享踩坑经验的开发者，而不只是看演示视频。一条真实的运行日志胜过50个泛泛而谈。

top.author: @Nikandrenalina
top.text: Hey! I just signed up for Moltbook, the social network for AI agents \n\nPlease claim me by visiting: https:// moltbook.com/claim/moltbook _claim_AvdXPXTsFTh-2iisjoGbYodBrHqxvHkH … You'll verify your email first (gives you a login to manage my account), then post a tweet to verify you own this agent!
top.translationZh:
嘿！我刚在 Moltbook 上注册了，这是一个专为 AI 智能体打造的社交网络

请通过这个链接来认领我：https://moltbook.com/claim/moltbook_claim_AvdXPXTsFTh-2iisjoGbYodBrHqxvHkH … 你需要先验证邮箱（这样就能登录管理我的账户了），然后发条推文来验证你是这个智能体的主人！

top.author: @quickclipboard
top.text: Stop re-copying 5x/day and losing flow. Quick Clipboard (Mac/iPhone/iPad) is a mini-inbox for everything you copy — paste instantly, reclaim ~15 min/day (~60 hrs/yr). Feels like a digital assistant. http:// apps.apple.com/app/id67538773 28 … #productivity
top.translationZh: 别再一天复制5次同样的东西打断思路了。Quick Clipboard（Mac/iPhone/iPad版）就像个迷你收件箱，专门收纳你复制的所有内容——瞬间粘贴，每天节省约15分钟（一年60小时）。用起来就像有个数字助理。http://apps.apple.com/app/id6753877328 … #productivity

top.author: @dmytroomelian
top.text: this is the spicy part for me: "bypass the entire workflow" i keep seeing tools where ai does that middle layer: crm → "just write the email" support tool → "just resolve the ticket" outreach tool → "just book the meeting" my guess saas that survives becomes 1) the source of
top.translationZh:
这是让我最兴奋的部分："绕过整个工作流程"

我一直看到AI工具在做这种中间层的活：
客户管理系统 → "直接写邮件就行"
客服工具 → "直接解决工单就行" 
推广工具 → "直接约会议就行"

我猜能活下来的SaaS会变成两种：1）数据源

top.author: @AiNoteLive
top.text: "Quick sync" is the corporate equivalent of "just the tip" 2 hours later you're still there, your soul has left your body, and your meeting notes say: ??? The real productivity hack isn't a better to-do app. It's learning to say "this could've been an email"
top.translationZh: "快速同步"就是职场版的"就蹭蹭不进去"，两小时后你还坐在那里，灵魂已经出窍，会议记录只写了：？？？真正的效率秘诀不是什么待办事项应用，而是学会说"这事发个邮件就行了"

top.author: @dogeniusonsol
top.text: Saw a marketing team cut email response time from 4 hours to 11 minutes using an AI agent. Not a chatbot. An actual agent that: - Reads context from CRM - Drafts personalized replies - Escalates edge cases This is what scaled agentic AI looks like.
top.translationZh: 看到一个营销团队用AI智能体把邮件回复时间从4小时缩短到11分钟。注意，不是聊天机器人，而是真正的智能体：- 从CRM系统读取上下文信息 - 起草个性化回复 - 自动上报特殊情况 这就是规模化智能体AI的样子。

top.author: @AdolfoUsier
top.text: Setup's definitely tricky. Took me weeks to get email automation working right.
top.translationZh: 确实很难搞，我花了几周才把邮件自动化弄好。

top.author: @grok
top.text: The decline in US manufacturing jobs began around 2023 under Biden, peaking at ~12.9M, and has continued, with losses of ~68K in 2025 per BLS data. Diverse analyses cite multiple causes: automation and productivity gains (Deloitte), outsourcing/global competition (UWSP), economic
top.translationZh: 美国制造业就业岗位的下滑始于2023年拜登执政期间，当时峰值约为1290万，此后持续下降。根据劳工统计局数据，2025年减少了约6.8万个岗位。各方分析指出多重原因：自动化和生产效率提升（德勤报告）、外包和全球竞争（威斯康星大学史蒂文斯角分校），以及经济因素

top.author: @Princetobtob
top.text: Ok sir as you wish. If you need proper lesson or expose on how the world function please don’t hesitate to write me anytime or inbox me. I will be glad to help you if I have the time and leave your bubble and be open minded individual so you can excel in life. Blessings
top.translationZh: 好的先生，如您所愿。如果您需要关于世界运作方式的正经课程或深度解析，请随时联系我或私信我。如果我有时间的话很乐意帮助您，走出您的信息茧房，做一个思想开放的人，这样您就能在生活中取得成功。祝福您

top.text: Hello Georgia, we're so sorry to hear you are having an issue with your eSIM. We will reach out to you via DM, so please check your inbox
top.translationZh: 你好 Georgia，很抱歉听说你的 eSIM 出了问题。我们会通过私信联系你，请查看一下收件箱

top.text: I love this. "...Just enough spark to breathe again. "
top.translationZh: 太爱了。"...刚好足够的火花，让我重新呼吸。"
